DOC.brief_title: Aneuploidy Rates Advanced Maternal Age Patients Supplemented With Coenzyme Q10 ( CoQ10 ) Versus Those That Are Not : Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . 3642 year old 2 . Must present AMH level ≤2.0 ng/mL 3 . 1st cycle IVF treatment 4 . Antral follicle count > 5 < 20 1 . BMI > 39 2 . Active smoker 3 . Blood serum baseline level CoQ10 ≥2.20 µg/mL 4 . Prior use CoQ10 5 . Type II diabetes mellitus
